title: stuffing sausage rolls with tomato relish
description: These sausage rolls are a good way to use up leftover Christmas stuffing in preparation for a New Year party.
ingredients: 250g/9oz tomatoes, skins left on, seeds removed, flesh finely chopped
1 lime, juice plus grated zest of ½ lime
½ small red chilli, seeds removed, finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
250g/9oz leftover cooked sage-and-onion stuffing, chopped into small pieces
2 free-range egg yolks, beaten with 1 tbsp milk
salt and freshly ground black pepper
